  • Constructor Details

    • Colony

      public Colony(int start, float gamma, float alpha, float beta, int maxantpop, IWeightedGraph graph, float rho)
      Public constructor for a Colony class
      Parameters:
      start - nest node identifier
      gamma - gamma parameter for pheromone decay
      alpha - alpha parameter for ant movement
      beta - beta parameter for ant movement
      maxantpop - maximum population of Ants in a Colony
      graph - Interface to acess graph to operate over
      rho - rho parameter for pheromone increment
      See Also:
      • Pheromone decay function
      • Ant move function
      • Ant selectNext function
      • Pheromone increment function
